SYSTEMSERVICEMONITORD(8) SystemServiceMonitor daemon for managing kexts and collections SYSTEMSERVICEMONITORD(8)

DESCRIPTION

systemservicemonitord is mainly used for facilicating the “one-time” setup process of important services. It allows client services to report their status, including “Presented” or “Ready” states. It also provide XPC interfaces for service status query.

2024-10-30
